channel.title: How to make minigame in one class? [317]
channel.description:
I coded 718 a bit (very bit) and in it everything could be handled in one class. That makes it a lot easier since you don't have to check 5 files for every object and interface button and so on. So how easy it would be to do same in 317 servers?
Also I am wondering this very nooby question: If I have lets say class CastleWars and it has public void startgame() how can I execute that void in commands class? EDIT: And what would be command to check if there is objects nearby?

item.title: How to make minigame in one class? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Java is java man. Of course you can re-handle minigames. My advice would be to use inheiritance and do some sort of global processing for all minigames.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make minigame in one class? [317]
